body:
Hello,

In the documentation (https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/config_yaml.html), both `directory_layout` and `install_path_scheme` appear but as far as I can tell only the latter is actually used in the source code.

As `directory_layout` is part of the default `config.yaml` file, my guess is that it might be a leftover from a name change.

Can someone clarify this?

Best regards,
Rémi
title: Documentation clarification: `directory_layout` vs `install_path_scheme`
